definition: to guard against/to exhort/to admonish or warn/to give up or stop doing sth/Buddhist monastic discipline/ring (for a finger)
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: The goal is complete abstention from all mind-altering substances.
sentences.chinese: 目標是徹底戒絕所有致幻物質。

sentences.english: You must keep your father off strong spirits.
sentences.chinese: 你必須讓你父親戒絕烈酒。

sentences.english: In addition, in terms of which type of meat people should give up, there are varied scales.
sentences.chinese: 而且，在戒絕肉食的種類上也有不同的等級。

sentences.english: And he emphasised that he eschewed luxuries.
sentences.chinese: 他強調說自己戒絕奢侈品。

sentences.english: How foolish and petty it would have been to deny oneself this small luxury.
sentences.chinese: 戒絕這種小小的奢侈享受那就實在太愚蠢，太小氣了。
